title: High Tunnel Water Collection with Cherry Flowers

tasks.task: Set up a high tunnel water collection and irrigation system using a SARE grant.
subtasks: Apply for a SARE grant for water capture.
Install gutters on both sides of the high tunnel.
Position rain barrels at the west side of the high tunnel.
Install a pump to power water movement.
Connect the pump to house electricity or a solar collector.
Distribute water through a drip irrigation system to the plants' roots.

tasks.task: Maintain high tunnel crops through succession planting.
subtasks: Start cool season crops like lettuce in the spring.
Transition to warm season crops in the middle of the year.
Replant with cool season crops in the fall.

tasks.task: Experiment with specialty crops in the high tunnel.
subtasks: Grow tomatoes, peppers, eggplant, sweet potatoes, ginger, and turmeric.
Manage high tunnel temperature preferences for warm and cool crops.

tasks.task: Operate an aquaponics and hydroponics system in the high tunnel.
subtasks: Set up and maintain aquaponics equipment.
Set up and maintain hydroponics equipment.
Monitor water and nutrient levels for plants.

tasks.task: Manage water in the high tunnel to prevent flooding.
subtasks: Redirect water flow from the high tunnel using gutters.
Use rain barrels to collect excess water.
Pump collected water through a drip irrigation system.
